scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others -n "data-exporter,data,shared,client,server" -c "bgYellow,bgBlue,bgMagenta,bgRed,bgGreen" "cd data-exporter && yarn run dev" "cd data && yarn run dev" "cd shared && yarn run dev" "cd client && yarn run dev" "cd server && yarn run dev"
scripts.clean: yarn clean:data-exporter && yarn clean:data && yarn clean:shared && yarn clean:server && yarn clean:client
scripts.clean:data-exporter: cd data-exporter && rm -f tsconfig.tsbuildinfo && rm -rf dist
scripts.clean:data: cd data && rm -f tsconfig.tsbuildinfo && rm -rf dist && rm -f src/data.ts && cp src/dataTemplate.ts src/data.ts
scripts.clean:shared: cd shared && rm -f tsconfig.tsbuildinfo && rm -rf dist
scripts.clean:server: cd server && rm -f tsconfig.tsbuildinfo && rm -rf dist
